welcome.text: I can send you the latest phases of the moon.

payload.text: Would you like to know the phase of tonight's moon?
I didn't understand that. Are you interested in knowing what tonight's moon is?
I'm based in Brooklyn, NY and all my moon data is in US/Eastern Time Zone time. I was created by Chris Nager and launched on his wife's 400th lunar monthiversary.
Oh ok, I'm here whenever you want to know.
Tonight's moon is a waning gibbous. 🌖

Sun Jan 15
🌖 Waning gibbous

Mon Jan 16
🌖 Waning gibbous

Tue Jan 17
🌖 Waning gibbous

Wed Jan 18
🌗 Last quarter

Thu Jan 19
🌗 Last quarter

Fri Jan 20
🌗 Last quarter

Sat Jan 21
🌗 Last quarter

Thu Jan 5
🌓 First quarter

Thu Jan 12
🌝 Full moon!

Thu Jan 19
🌗 Last quarter
